item.title: Don’t Believe The Lies From NYT Russia Hoaxers About The Durham Annex
item.description: Russia hoax handmaiden Charlie Savage falsely claimed that the annex to the Durham report said something it never actually said.

item.title: We Don’t Need The Durham Annex To Know Hillary And The FBI Set Up Trump. We Watched It Happen
item.description: In fact, we didn’t need secret intelligence to expose the plan. It was playing out openly before our eyes in real time.

item.title: ‘Sydney Sweeney Has Great Jeans’ Is An Admission That Woke Marketing Was A Mistake
item.description: The return of beauty and sex appeal to the fashion industry is a sign that nature is healing itself
